metadata.title: CVE-2013-2044 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Open redirect vulnerability in the Login Page (index.php) in ownCloudbefore 5.0.6 allows remote attackers to redirect users to arbitrary websites and conduct phishing attacks via a URL in the redirect_url parameter.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-2044` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

owncloud - 6.0.1+dfsg-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: owncloud package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.0.1+dfsg-1ubuntu1').
